Player History
Drafted in 23rd round, 359th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Kendry Esparza (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/2015, off Marion Tobler (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2016, hitting .529 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 8/6/2016 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
Traded from Colorado to San Francisco on 7/31/2017 (Going to COL: 1B Geraldo Madrid. Going to SF: C Phillip Barrientos)...
